message.original: 目指しましょう！ 共に勝利を！！
message.translation: Let us aim for victory together!!

message.original: 最高のパートナーですね、マスター！
message.translation: You're the best partner, Master!

message.original: なんと心強い！ 負ける気がしません！
message.translation: What strength of heart! I don't feel like I could lose!

message.original: 共に行けること、誇りに思います！
message.translation: I am proud to haved lived alongside you!

message.original: おお！ この出会いに感謝します！
message.translation: Oh! I am thankful for this encounter!

message.original: いざ行かん、試練の旅へ！
message.translation: Come, we must go on this ordeal of a journey.

message.original: おお！ あの方が来られたのでは？
message.translation: Oh! To think that person could come?

message.original: これぞ、熱意の成せる業！
message.translation: This is it, the zeal of building karma!

message.original: よしッ！ 次もこの調子で！！
message.translation: Alright! Do the next one in the same style!!

message.original: 我がマスターに栄光あれ！
message.translation: Glory to my Master!

message.original: くっ――この失敗は次の糧に！
message.translation: Urgh...this failure will be my next meal!

message.original: 努力のたまものです！
message.translation: This is the gift of perseverence!

message.original: 我が力、尽きること無し！
message.translation: My strength is inexhaustible!

message.original: 授かりし力、存分に奮う覚悟！
message.translation: Prepare to fully wield the blessings of the four powers!

message.original: どんな冒険が始まるのでしょうね、マスター！
message.translation: I wonder what kind of adventure will begin, eh Master!

message.original: 我らの行く手、さえぎるものなし！
message.translation: There is nothing that will stop us from moving forward!

message.original: いた、そこか！
message.translation: There it is, over there!

message.original: 敵発見、備えを！
message.translation: Enemy spotted, prepare yourselves!

message.original: 我がマスターの邪魔はさせるか！
message.translation: Like I'd let you get in the way of my Master!

message.original: これは！ 相手にとって不足なし！
message.translation: Well then! There is no shortage of opponents!

message.original: なに、必ず勝機はあるはずです！
message.translation: What? There should always be a chance for victory!

message.original: 面目ありません！
message.translation: You have no honour!

message.original: ――っ、救援を！
message.translation: Oof, a reprieve!

message.original: 手を貸して下さい！
message.translation: Give us a hand will ya!

message.original: む、無念――
message.translation: N-no..regrets...

message.original: し、しまった――
message.translation: W-we did it!

message.original: 先手必勝！
message.translation: Victory goes to those who make the first move!

message.original: 蹴散らしましょう！
message.translation: Let us scatter the enemy!

message.original: うむ、いい戦いでした！
message.translation: Yep, that was a good fight!

message.original: ははは！ 我らの勝ちです！
message.translation: Hahaha! This is our win!

message.original: 我がマスターに敵はなし！！
message.translation: There will be no enemies of our Master!!

message.original: マスター！！ 今です！
message.translation: Master!! Do it now!

message.original: こんな傷など！ まだまだ余裕です
message.translation: Tis' only a flesh wound! I can still go on.

message.original: これしきの傷で、引くものかっ！
message.translation: You need not worry over these scratches!

message.original: 危機にこそ、チャンスがあります！
message.translation: In this crisis, we surely have a chance.

message.original: ま、まだまだぁ！！
message.translation: It's..it's not over yet!!

message.original: うおおお、持ちこたえてみせる！！
message.translation: Uooh! I'll show you I can hold on!!

message.original: マ、マスタァアーー！！！
message.translation: Snake? SNAKE?!? SNAAAAAAAAKEEE!!!

message.original: はあああああっ！
message.translation: Aaarrrghhhh!

message.original: よし！ 回復だ！
message.translation: Alright! Recovered!

message.original: こっちだぁ！ 臆病者ども！
message.translation: Over here! You cowards!

message.original: 何度でも助けます！
message.translation: I'll help you any number of times!

message.original: そうはさせるか！
message.translation: Like I'll let you do that!

message.original: ここで行く！
message.translation: I'll go here!

message.original: 受けてみろ！
message.translation: Take this!

message.original: 我が渾身の力！
message.translation: The power of my whole body!

message.original: 私を踏み台に！
message.translation: Use me as a platform!

message.original: 任せて下さい！
message.translation: Leave it to me!

message.original: 了解です！
message.translation: Acknowledged!

message.original: う！ で、できません！
message.translation: Oof! C-can't do that!
